VI.iii.1.C.9.a
.
Paying Accrued to Incarcerated Individuals
Accrued payments may be paid in full to an eligible claimant that is incarcerated.  These one-time, lump sum payments are not subject to the reductions of
38 U.S.C. 5313
, which limits payments of running monthly awards to individuals incarcerated for conviction of a felony.
Note
:  Full payment of a
Nehmer
award can also be made to an incarcerated
Nehmer
class member.
Reference
:  For more information on the payment of benefits under the
Nehmer
stipulation, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 2.A
-
C
.
